response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be significantly above market standards. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring you receive unparalleled value. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 750000}
